def left(n):
	n=n[-1]+n[:-1]
	n=n.lstrip('0')
	return n

def right(n):
	n=n[1:]+n[0]
	n=n.lstrip('0')
	return n
	
ch=input()
while ch:
	s=raw_input()
	ans=max(int(left(right(s))),int(right(left(s))))
	temp=s
	for i in range(len(s)):
		temp=left(temp)
		ans=max(ans,int(temp))
	temp=s
	for i in range(len(s)):
		temp=right(temp)
		ans=max(ans,int(temp))
	print ans
	ch-=1
